welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Reeuwijk, a charming city known for its scenic lakes and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its unique charm and enjoy all that it has to offer. We are happy to have you here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport is used for freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with modern amenities and a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
